Preferable: Oracle /Postgres*- Creating and maintaining high performance, scalable, and stable database solutions.- Work with customer, deployment squads, and product management to identify and document use case scenarios.- Lead on all data solution aspects including setting data standards and providing your deep technical expertise to development teams for best practices, systems, and architectures.- Design databases solutions that are highly available and meet disaster recovery requirements.- Design effective data store solutions that account for effective capacity planning, data tiering, and data life-cycle management- Design, Develop and maintain automated systems for process for AWS Cloud based products and services.- Troubleshoot issues with automations and ensure efficient solutions.- Collaborate with team members for effective and efficient automations.- Evaluate existing automation process and identify area of improvement.- Monitor and validate performance and functionality of the automated processes to ensure the objectives of automation are met.- Develop and maintain documentation for the automated processes and ensure knowledge transfer.- Mentor other team members on new technologies and automation process.- Work with QA to create detailed test plans and needed tooling to account targeted performance for production volume data- Ensure the successful delivery of solutions, training, and documentation, internally and with customers- Recommend solutions to improve new and existing database systems.- Participate in code reviews and create documentation for engineering and cross-functional practices.- Work with cross-functional teams to ensure end-to-end technical and business viability.- Learn new database technologies as necessary.
